verses.t: ALEPH.Blessed{H835} are the undefiled{H8549} in the way{H1870}, who walk{H1980} in the law{H8451} Lordof the {H3068}.undefiled: or, perfect, or, sincere
Blessed{H835} are they that keep{H5341} his testimonies{H5713}, and that seek{H1875} him with the whole heart{H3820}.
They also do{H6466} no iniquity{H5766}: they walk{H1980} in his ways{H1870}.
Thou hast commanded{H6680} us to keep{H8104} thy precepts{H6490} diligently{H3966}.
O that{H305} my ways{H1870} were directed{H3559} to keep{H8104} thy statutes{H2706}!
Then shall I not be ashamed{H954}, when I have respect{H5027} unto all thy commandments{H4687}.
I will praise{H3034} thee with uprightness{H3476} of heart{H3824}, when I shall have learned{H3925} thy righteous{H6664} judgments{H4941}.thy…: Heb. judgments of thy righteousness
I will keep{H8104} thy statutes{H2706}: O forsake{H5800} me not utterly{H3966}.
BETH.Wherewithal shall a young man{H5288} cleanse{H2135} his way{H734}? by taking heed{H8104} thereto according to thy word{H1697}.
With my whole heart{H3820} have I sought{H1875} thee: O let me not wander{H7686} from thy commandments{H4687}.
Thy word{H565} have I hid{H6845} in mine heart{H3820}, that I might not sin{H2398} against thee.
Blessed{H1288} art Lordthou, O {H3068}: teach{H3925} me thy statutes{H2706}.
With my lips{H8193} have I declared{H5608} all the judgments{H4941} of thy mouth{H6310}.
I have rejoiced{H7797} in the way{H1870} of thy testimonies{H5715}, as much as in{H5921} all riches{H1952}.
I will meditate{H7878} in thy precepts{H6490}, and have respect{H5027} unto thy ways{H734}.
I will delight{H8173} myself in thy statutes{H2708}: I will not forget{H7911} thy word{H1697}.
GIMEL.Deal bountifully{H1580} with thy servant{H5650}, that I may live{H2421}, and keep{H8104} thy word{H1697}.
Open{H1540} thou mine eyes{H5869}, that I may behold{H5027} wondrous things{H6381} out of thy law{H8451}.Open: Heb. Reveal
I am a stranger{H1616} in the earth{H776}: hide{H5641} not thy commandments{H4687} from me.
My soul{H5315} breaketh{H1638} for the longing{H8375} that it hath unto thy judgments{H4941} at all times{H6256}.
Thou hast rebuked{H1605} the proud{H2086} that are cursed{H779}, which do err{H7686} from thy commandments{H4687}.
Remove{H1556} from me reproach{H2781} and contempt{H937}; for I have kept{H5341} thy testimonies{H5713}.
Princes{H8269} also did sit{H3427} and speak{H1696} against me: but thy servant{H5650} did meditate{H7878} in thy statutes{H2706}.
Thy testimonies{H5713}are my delight{H8191} and my counsellors{H6098}.my counsellors: Heb. men of my counsel
DALETH.My soul{H5315} cleaveth{H1692} unto the dust{H6083}: quicken{H2421} thou me according to thy word{H1697}.
I have declared{H5608} my ways{H1870}, and thou heardest{H6030} me: teach{H3925} me thy statutes{H2706}.
Make me to understand{H995} the way{H1870} of thy precepts{H6490}: so shall I talk{H7878} of thy wondrous works{H6381}.
My soul{H5315} melteth{H1811} for heaviness{H8424}: strengthen{H6965} thou me according unto thy word{H1697}.melteth: Heb. droppeth
Remove{H5493} from me the way{H1870} of lying{H8267}: and grant me thy law{H8451} graciously{H2603}.
I have chosen{H977} the way{H1870} of truth{H530}: thy judgments{H4941} have I laid{H7737} before me.
I have stuck{H1692} unto thy testimonies{H5715}: LordO {H3068}, put me not to shame{H954}.
I will run{H7323} the way{H1870} of thy commandments{H4687}, when thou shalt enlarge{H7337} my heart{H3820}.
HE.Teach{H3384} Lordme, O {H3068}, the way{H1870} of thy statutes{H2706}; and I shall keep{H5341} it unto the end{H6118}.
Give me understanding{H995}, and I shall keep{H5341} thy law{H8451}; yea, I shall observe{H8104} it with my whole heart{H3820}.
Make me to go{H1869} in the path{H5410} of thy commandments{H4687}; for therein do I delight{H2654}.
Incline{H5186} my heart{H3820} unto thy testimonies{H5715}, and not to covetousness{H1215}.
Turn away{H5674} mine eyes{H5869} from beholding{H7200} vanity{H7723}; and quicken{H2421} thou me in thy way{H1870}.Turn…: Heb. Make to pass
Stablish{H6965} thy word{H565} unto thy servant{H5650}, who is devoted to thy fear{H3374}.
Turn away{H5674} my reproach{H2781} which I fear{H3025}: for thy judgments{H4941} are good{H2896}.
Behold, I have longed{H8373} after thy precepts{H6490}: quicken{H2421} me in thy righteousness{H6666}.
VAU.Let thy mercies{H2617} come{H935} Lordalso unto me, O {H3068}, even thy salvation{H8668}, according to thy word{H565}.
So shall I have wherewith{H1697} to answer{H6030} him that reproacheth{H2778} me: for I trust{H982} in thy word{H1697}.So…: or, So shall I answer him that reproveth me in a thing
And take{H5337} not the word{H1697} of truth{H571} utterly{H3966} out of my mouth{H6310}; for I have hoped{H3176} in thy judgments{H4941}.
So shall I keep{H8104} thy law{H8451} continually{H8548} for ever{H5769} and ever{H5703}.
And I will walk{H1980} at liberty{H7342}: for I seek{H1875} thy precepts{H6490}.at liberty: Heb. at large
I will speak{H1696} of thy testimonies{H5713} also before kings{H4428}, and will not be ashamed{H954}.
And I will delight{H8173} myself in thy commandments{H4687}, which I have loved{H157}.
My hands{H3709} also will I lift up{H5375} unto thy commandments{H4687}, which I have loved{H157}; and I will meditate{H7878} in thy statutes{H2706}.
ZAIN.Remember{H2142} the word{H1697} unto thy servant{H5650}, upon which thou hast caused me to hope{H3176}.
This is my comfort{H5165} in my affliction{H6040}: for thy word{H565} hath quickened{H2421} me.
The proud{H2086} have had me greatly{H3966} in derision{H3887}: yet have I not declined{H5186} from thy law{H8451}.
I remembered{H2142} thy judgments{H4941} of old{H5769}, LordO {H3068}; and have comforted{H5162} myself.
Horror{H2152} hath taken hold{H270} upon me because of the wicked{H7563} that forsake{H5800} thy law{H8451}.
Thy statutes{H2706} have been my songs{H2158} in the house{H1004} of my pilgrimage{H4033}.
I have remembered{H2142} thy name{H8034}, LordO {H3068}, in the night{H3915}, and have kept{H8104} thy law{H8451}.
This I had, because I kept{H5341} thy precepts{H6490}.
CHETH.Thou art my portion{H2506}, LordO {H3068}: I have said{H559} that I would keep{H8104} thy words{H1697}.
I intreated{H2470} thy favour{H6440} with my whole heart{H3820}: be merciful{H2603} unto me according to thy word{H565}.favour: Heb. face
I thought{H2803} on my ways{H1870}, and turned{H7725} my feet{H7272} unto thy testimonies{H5713}.
I made haste{H2363}, and delayed{H4102} not to keep{H8104} thy commandments{H4687}.
The bands{H2256} of the wicked{H7563} have robbed{H5749} me: but I have not forgotten{H7911} thy law{H8451}.bands: or, companies
At midnight{H3915} I will rise{H6965} to give thanks{H3034} unto thee because of thy righteous{H6664} judgments{H4941}.
I am a companion{H2270} of all them that fear{H3372} thee, and of them that keep{H8104} thy precepts{H6490}.
The earth{H776}, LordO {H3068}, is full{H4390} of thy mercy{H2617}: teach{H3925} me thy statutes{H2706}.
TETH.Thou hast dealt{H6213} well{H2896} with thy servant{H5650}, LordO {H3068}, according unto thy word{H1697}.
Teach{H3925} me good{H2898} judgment{H2940} and knowledge{H1847}: for I have believed{H539} thy commandments{H4687}.
Before I was afflicted{H6031} I went astray{H7683}but now have I kept{H8104} thy word{H565}.
Thou art good{H2896}, and doest good{H2895}; teach{H3925} me thy statutes{H2706}.
The proud{H2086} have forged{H2950} a lie{H8267} against me: but I will keep{H5341} thy precepts{H6490} with my whole heart{H3820}.
Their heart{H3820} is as fat{H2954} as grease{H2459}; but I delight{H8173} in thy law{H8451}.
It is good{H2896} for me that I have been afflicted{H6031}; that I might learn{H3925} thy statutes{H2706}.
The law{H8451} of thy mouth{H6310} is better{H2896} unto me than thousands{H505} of gold{H2091} and silver{H3701}.
JOD.Thy hands{H3027} have made{H6213} me and fashioned{H3559} me: give me understanding{H995}, that I may learn{H3925} thy commandments{H4687}.
They that fear{H3373} thee will be glad{H8055} when they see{H7200} me; because I have hoped{H3176} in thy word{H1697}.
I know{H3045}, LordO {H3068}, that thy judgments{H4941} are right{H6664}, and that thou in faithfulness{H530} hast afflicted{H6031} me.right: Heb. righteousness
Let, I pray thee, thy merciful kindness{H2617} be for my comfort{H5162}, according to thy word{H565} unto thy servant{H5650}.for…: Heb. to comfort me
Let thy tender mercies{H7356} come{H935} unto me, that I may live{H2421}: for thy law{H8451} is my delight{H8191}.
Let the proud{H2086} be ashamed{H954}; for they dealt perversely{H5791} with me without a cause{H8267}: but I will meditate{H7878} in thy precepts{H6490}.
Let those that fear{H3373} thee turn{H7725} unto me, and those that have known{H3045} thy testimonies{H5713}.
Let my heart{H3820} be sound{H8549} in thy statutes{H2706}; that I be not ashamed{H954}.
CAPH.My soul{H5315} fainteth{H3615} for thy salvation{H8668}: but I hope{H3176} in thy word{H1697}.
Mine eyes{H5869} fail{H3615} for thy word{H565}, saying{H559}, When wilt thou comfort{H5162} me?
For I am become like a bottle{H4997} in the smoke{H7008}; yet do I not forget{H7911} thy statutes{H2706}.
How many are the days{H3117} of thy servant{H5650}? when wilt thou execute{H6213} judgment{H4941} on them that persecute{H7291} me?
The proud{H2086} have digged{H3738} pits{H7882} for me, which are not after thy law{H8451}.
All thy commandments{H4687} are faithful{H530}: they persecute{H7291} me wrongfully{H8267}; help{H5826} thou me.faithful: Heb. faithfulness
They had almost{H4592} consumed{H3615} me upon earth{H776}; but I forsook{H5800} not thy precepts{H6490}.
Quicken{H2421} me after thy lovingkindness{H2617}; so shall I keep{H8104} the testimony{H5715} of thy mouth{H6310}.
LAMED.For ever{H5769}, LordO {H3068}, thy word{H1697} is settled{H5324} in heaven{H8064}.
Thy faithfulness{H530} is unto all{H1755} generations{H1755}: thou hast established{H3559} the earth{H776}, and it abideth{H5975}.unto…: Heb. to generation and generationabideth: Heb. standeth
They continue{H5975} this day{H3117} according to thine ordinances{H4941}: for all are thy servants{H5650}.
Unless{H3884} thy law{H8451} had been my delights{H8191}, I should then have perished{H6} in mine affliction{H6040}.
I will never{H5769} forget{H7911} thy precepts{H6490}: for with them thou hast quickened{H2421} me.
I am thine, save{H3467} me; for I have sought{H1875} thy precepts{H6490}.
The wicked{H7563} have waited{H6960} for me to destroy{H6} me: but I will consider{H995} thy testimonies{H5713}.
I have seen{H7200} an end{H7093} of all perfection{H8502}: but thy commandment{H4687} is exceeding{H3966} broad{H7342}.
MEM.O how love I{H157} thy law{H8451}! it is my meditation{H7881} all the day{H3117}.
Thou through thy commandments{H4687} hast made me wiser{H2449} than mine enemies{H341}: for they are ever{H5769} with me.they…: Heb. it is ever with me
I have more understanding{H7919} than all my teachers{H3925}: for thy testimonies{H5715} are my meditation{H7881}.
I understand{H995} more than the ancients{H2205}, because I keep{H5341} thy precepts{H6490}.
I have refrained{H3607} my feet{H7272} from every evil{H7451} way{H734}, that I might keep{H8104} thy word{H1697}.
I have not departed{H5493} from thy judgments{H4941}: for thou hast taught{H3384} me.
How sweet{H4452} are thy words{H565} unto my taste{H2441}! yea, sweeter than honey{H1706} to my mouth{H6310}!taste: Heb. palate
Through thy precepts{H6490} I get understanding{H995}: therefore I hate{H8130} every false{H8267} way{H734}.
NUN.Thy word{H1697} is a lamp{H5216} unto my feet{H7272}, and a light{H216} unto my path{H5410}.lamp: or, candle
I have sworn{H7650}, and I will perform{H6965} it, that I will keep{H8104} thy righteous{H6664} judgments{H4941}.
I am afflicted{H6031} very much{H3966}: quicken{H2421} Lordme, O {H3068}, according unto thy word{H1697}.
Accept{H7521}, I beseech thee, the freewill offerings{H5071} of my mouth{H6310}, LordO {H3068}, and teach{H3925} me thy judgments{H4941}.
My soul{H5315} is continually{H8548} in my hand{H3709}: yet do I not forget{H7911} thy law{H8451}.
The wicked{H7563} have laid{H5414} a snare{H6341} for me: yet I erred{H8582} not from thy precepts{H6490}.
Thy testimonies{H5715} have I taken as an heritage{H5157} for ever{H5769}: for they are the rejoicing{H8342} of my heart{H3820}.
I have inclined{H5186} mine heart{H3820} to perform{H6213} thy statutes{H2706} alway{H5769}, even unto the end{H6118}.to perform: Heb. to do
SAMECH.I hate{H8130} vain thoughts{H5588}: but thy law{H8451} do I love{H157}.
Thou art my hiding place{H5643} and my shield{H4043}: I hope{H3176} in thy word{H1697}.
Depart{H5493} from me, ye evildoers{H7489}: for I will keep{H5341} the commandments{H4687} of my God{H430}.
Uphold{H5564} me according unto thy word{H565}, that I may live{H2421}: and let me not be ashamed{H954} of my hope{H7664}.
Hold thou me up{H5582}, and I shall be safe{H3467}: and I will have respect{H8159} unto thy statutes{H2706} continually{H8548}.
Thou hast trodden down{H5541} all them that err{H7686} from thy statutes{H2706}: for their deceit{H8649} is falsehood{H8267}.
Thou puttest away{H7673} all the wicked{H7563} of the earth{H776} like dross{H5509}: therefore I love{H157} thy testimonies{H5713}.puttest…: Heb. causest to cease
My flesh{H1320} trembleth{H5568} for fear{H6343} of thee; and I am afraid{H3372} of thy judgments{H4941}.
AIN.I have done{H6213} judgment{H4941} and justice{H6664}: leave{H3240} me not to mine oppressors{H6231}.
Be surety{H6148} for thy servant{H5650} for good{H2896}: let not the proud{H2086} oppress{H6231} me.
Mine eyes{H5869} fail{H3615} for thy salvation{H3444}, and for the word{H565} of thy righteousness{H6664}.
Deal{H6213} with thy servant{H5650} according unto thy mercy{H2617}, and teach{H3925} me thy statutes{H2706}.
I am thy servant{H5650}; give me understanding{H995}, that I may know{H3045} thy testimonies{H5713}.
It is time{H6256} for thee, Lord, to work{H6213}: for they have made void{H6565} thy law{H8451}.
Therefore I love{H157} thy commandments{H4687} above gold{H2091}; yea, above fine gold{H6337}.
Therefore I esteem all thy precepts{H6490} concerning all things to be right{H3474}; and I hate{H8130} every false{H8267} way{H734}.
PE.Thy testimonies{H5715} are wonderful{H6382}: therefore doth my soul{H5315} keep{H5341} them.
The entrance{H6608} of thy words{H1697} giveth light{H215}; it giveth understanding{H995} unto the simple{H6612}.
I opened{H6473} my mouth{H6310}, and panted{H7602}: for I longed{H2968} for thy commandments{H4687}.
Look{H6437} thou upon me, and be merciful{H2603} unto me, as thou usest{H4941} to do unto those that love{H157} thy name{H8034}.as thou…: Heb. according to the custom toward those, etc
Order{H3559} my steps{H6471} in thy word{H565}: and let not any iniquity{H205} have dominion{H7980} over me.
Deliver{H6299} me from the oppression{H6233} of man{H120}: so will I keep{H8104} thy precepts{H6490}.
Make thy face{H6440} to shine{H215} upon thy servant{H5650}; and teach{H3925} me thy statutes{H2706}.
Rivers{H6388} of waters{H4325} run down{H3381} mine eyes{H5869}, because they keep{H8104} not thy law{H8451}.
TZADDI.Righteous{H6662} art Lordthou, O {H3068}, and upright{H3477} are thy judgments{H4941}.
Thy testimonies{H5713} that thou hast commanded{H6680} are righteous{H6664} and very{H3966} faithful{H530}.righteous: Heb. righteousnessfaithful: Heb. faithfulness
My zeal{H7068} hath consumed{H6789} me, because mine enemies{H6862} have forgotten{H7911} thy words{H1697}.consumed…: Heb. cut me off
Thy word{H565} is very{H3966} pure{H6884}: therefore thy servant{H5650} loveth{H157} it.pure: Heb. tried, or, refined
I am small{H6810} and despised{H959}: yet do not I forget{H7911} thy precepts{H6490}.
Thy righteousness{H6666} is an everlasting{H5769} righteousness{H6664}, and thy law{H8451} is the truth{H571}.
Trouble{H6862} and anguish{H4689} have taken hold{H4672} on me: yet thy commandments{H4687} are my delights{H8191}.taken…: Heb. found me
The righteousness{H6664} of thy testimonies{H5715} is everlasting{H5769}: give me understanding{H995}, and I shall live{H2421}.
KOPH.I cried{H7121} with my whole heart{H3820}; hear{H6030} Lordme, O {H3068}: I will keep{H5341} thy statutes{H2706}.
I cried{H7121} unto thee; save{H3467} me, and I shall keep{H8104} thy testimonies{H5713}.and I…: or, that I may keep
I prevented{H6923} the dawning of the morning{H5399}, and cried{H7768}: I hoped{H3176} in thy word{H1697}.
Mine eyes{H5869} prevent{H6923} the night watches{H821}, that I might meditate{H7878} in thy word{H565}.
Hear{H8085} my voice{H6963} according unto thy lovingkindness{H2617}: LordO {H3068}, quicken{H2421} me according to thy judgment{H4941}.
They draw nigh{H7126} that follow{H7291}after mischief{H2154}: they are far{H7368} from thy law{H8451}.
Thou art near{H7138}, LordO {H3068}; and all thy commandments{H4687} are truth{H571}.
Concerning thy testimonies{H5713}, I have known{H3045} of old{H6924} that thou hast founded{H3245} them for ever{H5769}.
RESH.Consider{H7200} mine affliction{H6040}, and deliver{H2502} me: for I do not forget{H7911} thy law{H8451}.
Plead{H7378} my cause{H7379}, and deliver{H1350} me: quicken{H2421} me according to thy word{H565}.
Salvation{H3444} is far{H7350} from the wicked{H7563}: for they seek{H1875} not thy statutes{H2706}.
Great{H7227} are thy tender mercies{H7356}, LordO {H3068}: quicken{H2421} me according to thy judgments{H4941}.Great: or, Many
Many{H7227} are my persecutors{H7291} and mine enemies{H6862}; yet do I not decline{H5186} from thy testimonies{H5715}.
I beheld{H7200} the transgressors{H898}, and was grieved{H6962}; because they kept{H8104} not thy word{H565}.
Consider{H7200} how I love{H157} thy precepts{H6490}: quicken{H2421} Lordme, O {H3068}, according to thy lovingkindness{H2617}.
Thy word{H1697} is true{H571} from the beginning{H7218}: and every one of thy righteous{H6664} judgments{H4941} endureth for ever{H5769}.Thy word…: Heb. The beginning of thy word is true
SCHIN.Princes{H8269} have persecuted{H7291} me without a cause{H2600}: but my heart{H3820} standeth in awe{H6342} of thy word{H1697}.
I rejoice{H7797} at thy word{H565}, as one that findeth{H4672} great{H7227} spoil{H7998}.
I hate{H8130} and abhor{H8581} lying{H8267}: but thy law{H8451} do I love{H157}.
Seven times{H7651} a day{H3117} do I praise{H1984} thee because of thy righteous{H6664} judgments{H4941}.
Great{H7227} peace{H7965} have they which love{H157} thy law{H8451}: and nothing shall offend{H4383} them.nothing…: Heb. they shall have no stumblingblock
Lord, I have hoped{H7663} for thy salvation{H3444}, and done{H6213} thy commandments{H4687}.
My soul{H5315} hath kept{H8104} thy testimonies{H5713}; and I love{H157} them exceedingly{H3966}.
I have kept{H8104} thy precepts{H6490} and thy testimonies{H5713}: for all my ways{H1870} are before thee.
TAU.Let my cry{H7440} come near{H7126} before{H6440} Lordthee, O {H3068}: give me understanding{H995} according to thy word{H1697}.
Let my supplication{H8467} come{H935} before{H6440} thee: deliver{H5337} me according to thy word{H565}.
My lips{H8193} shall utter{H5042} praise{H8416}, when thou hast taught{H3925} me thy statutes{H2706}.
My tongue{H3956} shall speak{H6030} of thy word{H565}: for all thy commandments{H4687} are righteousness{H6664}.
Let thine hand{H3027} help{H5826} me; for I have chosen{H977} thy precepts{H6490}.
I have longed{H8373} for thy salvation{H3444}, LordO {H3068}; and thy law{H8451} is my delight{H8191}.
Let my soul{H5315} live{H2421}, and it shall praise{H1984} thee; and let thy judgments{H4941} help{H5826} me.
I have gone astray{H8582} like a lost{H6} sheep{H7716}; seek{H1245} thy servant{H5650}; for I do not forget{H7911} thy commandments{H4687}.
